prompt:
Human: Given the following prompt:
---
Schedule a half hour meeting with Nigel next week
---
You are representing a user with the WebId <http://localhost:3002/nigel#me>
Please return a JSON object containing exactly the smallest set of named graphs which are required to answer this question and the WebId of who we need to negotiate with to answer the prompt, if any.
The WebId of anyone we negotiate with must be related to <http://localhost:3002/nigel#me> via the <http://schema.org/knows> predicate.
The JSON object should take the form `{ "negotiationWebId": /* string webId of who to negotiate with */, "requiredNamedGraphs": /* array of named graphs needed to answer the query */ }`
I want to parse this array directly so please do not include anything else in the response.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
